description: Comfort starts with fit and feel. That’s why their Men’s Intraknit™ Active Lined Short is designed with a body-skimming athletic fit, stretch-woven fabric with a quick-dry finish, and a boxer brief liner that helps with temperature control, moisture management, and odor resistance. Plus, these shorts offer practical features like pockets and reflective elements for when light goes low. For your next warm-weather adventure, whether that’s a mountain hike or a stroll to visit your neighborhood barista, these shorts will help you stay comfy.
name: Smartwool Intraknit Active Lined Shorts - Mens

specs.value: 34% Merino Wool, 34% Lyocell, 23% Polyester, 8% Elastane, 1% Nylon
Their athletic fit is intended to be body-skimming and enhance the body in motion
